p: The extraction of β-1,3-glucanase and chitinase was based on the method of Magnin­ Robert et al. (2007). Deveined leaf (0.2 g FW) was homogenized in 5 ml cold sodium acetate buffer, PH 5.0 containing one mmol dithiothreitol and 10 mg phenylmethysulfonyl fluoride in a cold mortal. The crude extracts were centrifuged at 4,000 rpm for 50 min at 4 °C and supernatants were used in enzymatic activity assays.
